properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, D.* FROM ( SELECT C.C_NO , C_TITLE , COUNT , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" , C_STAR FROM COOK_BOARD C JOIN ATTECHMENT A ON (C.C_NO = A.C_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY C.C_NO DESC )D ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM COOK_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO COOK_BOARD ( C_NO , C_TITLE , C_CONTENTS , USER_NO , C_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( COOK_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTECHMENT ( FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL , BOARD_CATEGORY , C_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , COOK_BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL )
UPDATE COOK_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE C_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT C_NO , C_TITLE , C_CONTENTS , C_DATE , USER_ID , C_CATEGORY , C_STAR FROM COOK_BOARD C JOIN MEMBER USING (USER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.C_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTECHMENT WHERE C_NO = ?
UPDATE COOK_BOARD SET C_TITLE = ? , C_CONTENTS = ? , C_CATEGORY = ? WHERE C_NO = ?
UPDATE COOK_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE C_NO = ?
UPDATE COOK_BOARD SET C_STAR = C_STAR + 1 WHERE C_NO = ?
INSERT INTO LIKE_LIST ( LIKE_NO , USER_NO , C_NO ) VALUES ( LIKE_LIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM LIKE_LIST WHERE USER_NO = ? AND C_NO = ?
UPDATE COOK_BOARD SET C_STAR = C_STAR - 1 WHERE C_NO = ?
DELETE FROM LIKE_LIST WHERE USER_NO = ? AND C_NO = ?
